section.title: Extending the overview page
section.para: When a user opens http://localhost/ or http://hostname/ in a browser, she is redirected to the UCS overview. Depending on the preferred language negotiated by the browser the user is either redirected to the German version /var/www/ucs-overview/de.html or English version /var/www/ucs-overview/en.html.
By default this page provides the following links:

These overview pages are &ucsUCR; Multifile templates () and can be extended by adding additional subfiles. The pages use a HTML table with a three column layout. It is opened in subfile 01en.html and closed in 99en.html. In between each entry is rendered as a table row with the follosing columns:

listitem.simpara: The first column may contain an icon of size 24Ã—24 pixels.
The second column should contain a link to the resource.
The third column should contain a short descriptive text.
